notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Northmen have bought or sold real estate.
1. Alla Vista Terrace, south of Byron St., S. E. Gross to Edith L. Erickson. Price $4925.
2. Paulina St. north of Waveland Av., J. Benson to Mollie L. Scharf. Price $3700.
3. Byron St. north of 40th Av. G. Lundahl to Bertha Norin. Price $2900.
4. N. 45th Av., south of Byron St., A. K. Sorensen to Johanne Johnson. Price $3500.
5. Humbolt Av. cor Spaulding Ave., Anna Mickelson to Ferdinand Radtke. Price $8,600.
6. Hirsch St., west of Washtenaw Av., G. C. Carlson to Robert O. Nokleby. Price $3000.
